acceptance_tests: User can launch multiple agents simultaneously without interference between tasks.
Each agent task runs in its own git worktree with independent branch and working directory.
Changes made by agents are visible in a built-in diff viewer for quick review and editing.
Workspaces created in version 0.0.82 function correctly without regression.
